title: Whiterun Contracts: Talos Sting, Wolves, and a Giant
session_summary: Elitrof Whitemane returned to Jorrvaskr, took several Companions contracts, uncovered a Thalmor-backed Talos shrine harassment sting (capturing Justiciar Varyn and accomplices), cleared the Chillfurrow wolf den, then ended the day by taking the Pelagia farm giant solo with Elemental Fury. The session closes with Vilkas at Dragonsreach awaiting Jarl Balgruuf's ruling on the captives.
key_events: Jorrvaskr homecoming; public flyting and Trouble compel taken
Contracts accepted: protect Talos pilgrims, cull Chillfurrow wolves, and slay the Pelagia giant
Talos shrine sting exposed; Justiciar Varyn maimed and captured alive; Nazeem and a guard-imposter captured
Chillfurrow wolves cleared; alpha slain; Berserker Draught refined (dose 2 retained)
Pelagia giant taken out solo; Elemental Fury used (unmastered) with witness (Farkas)
End state: captives in transit/at Dragonsreach for Balgruuf's judgment
npcs_encountered: Justiciar Varyn - Thalmor handler; captured and cauterized
loot_acquired: Alpha Wolf Pelt trophy (sent with Farkas)
Berserker Draught: Skaal Crimson Cut (1 remaining dose)
notes: End-of-session state: Elitrof FP 2 (Refresh 1; keeps higher), Physical stress boxes 1 and 3 marked, no consequences. Companions Trust 7/10 (Champion). Elemental Fury Mastery 2/8. Next session opens on the Dragonsreach hearing with Thalmor pressure and narrative control attempts.
